system.requirements:
Tier 1; Agility 30
Aptitudes: Agility, Fieldcraft, Slaanesh
system.effect: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist. Also add +20 to Acrobatics Skill Tests when using the Jump Special Use for the purpose of reducing Fall Damage.

description.value: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist. Also add +20 to Acrobatics Skill Tests when using the Jump Special Use for the purpose of reducing Fall Damage.
